item.title: Ubuntu and Pip3
item.description: Tried to use Kdenlive to install some packages via pip (I didn’t want to but that’s what it offered) finally got a good rejection! error: externally-managed-environment × This environment is externally managed ╰─> To install Python packages system-wide, try apt install python3-xyz, where xyz is the package you are trying to install. If you wish to install a non-Debian-packaged Python package, create a virtual environment using python3 -m venv path/to/venv. Then use path/to/venv/bin/python and path/to/venv/bin/pip.
